response: Amazon uses a placeholder date for the end of the year until they know the official date. It will be updated when they know more. If you preorder now, it will ship on the official release date. We will probably find out more about it at the Tokyo Game Show this fall.

context: Will this fit on a Seiki SE24FE01-W 24-Inch Tv heres the link for pics Seiki SE24FE01-W 24-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED TV (2014 Model)
response: I don't see why not. I have a 55" led Samsung TV an it fit fine. It adjust in the back. I love it!

context: How does it compare to the Logitech G600? I own a G600 and my fat thumb has a hard time finding the 12 side buttons. I end up only using 3 or 4
response: I had the g600 before i got this.The buttons take some getting used to when you first get it but the build material and quality is a lot higher than the logitech. The buttons are easier to press on the corsair one once you get used to where they are at also.

context: Is the Map pack included within the game or is there a code included?
response: How do I find that out?  I play multi most of the time and don't play online at all.

context: Does it work with Windows 7
response: I did not use the controller I just returned it, it was not the controller pictured or the controller I ordered! I would not buy from this seller!

context: Does this player have typical internet access such as facebook?
response: No it does not. It is basically a player loaded down with a bunch of my favorite old games.

context: Can this game handle 1 - 4 players using 4 shock controllers?
response: I believe it's only up to 2 players at a time.

context: Will this program run on the XP system
response: Mine did when I had xp because it was 32 bit.  Wont run on my widow 7 64bit.

context: If this is a launch day bundle, is the ps4 a first day ps4 which has problems?
response: I'm not sure if I understood the question, but if you are asking if the PS4 has problems, I would say that not all of them have.

context: What all does your system come with, The wire hook up for the tv, controllers? anything?
response: Mine came with the wires for the tv and no controllers. I bought a 2 pack of controllers from a separate buyer for really cheap. Hope this helps!

context: Is this a quiet keyboard or are the keys noisy when you strike them?   Thanks.
response: I would say this keyboard is right in the middle of the two, because it is not loud, or quiet when i "strike" the keys. I have had this keyboard for about 2 months now, and i still love it.

context: does it work with windows 8
response: Yes it works on Windows 8.

context: Is this game 4 player split-screen or 2?
response: Sadly, it's only 2 player local only splitscreen. And you can only use one profile at a time, so the 2 player is limited to player 1's progress. Kinda lame.

context: Does this game contain a printed manual? Does it have any insert in the box?
response: No manual really needed, pretty easy learning curve for a game such as this. Only insert was the code for the bonus "Fellowship Pack" in my edition...

context: would this work with the version 2000?
response: Vita tv has nothing to do with vita 2000. All the later games will work on vita tv.

response: Alright thanks for the insight! Helped me a lot! -Cameron

context: How long is the length of the cable?
response: 6 feet 1 inch, that's longer than I am tall.

context: Does it work on the iMac? I want something to use with F1 2013   My PC flight yoke works for steering, but I also need analog gas/brake.
response: I actually have a Mac, but it works as a standard device (it's kind of crappy actually on it), I don't own F1 2013 on MAC (i do on Windows). But I would recommend you to launch BootCam and run this wheel on Windows natively, if you can.

context: This version includes Korean subtitles?
response: I don't believe it does.

context: I wanted to purchase this game but I do have a Steam account will this game will be able to be played through Steam?
response: No, if you buy it here, you'll have to play it through Telltale's website.

context: What is that cable used for?
response: The one I got was 6ft or there abouts, used for sitting further from the xbox. I had hoped it would allow me use a 360 controller with the original xbox but this was not the case.

context: Will this work with the New Nintendo 3DSXL?
response: Hey, it's should. I never got mine but the game slot is the same size in the 3Ds and XL.
